name: Monstera Deliciosa
info: Large tropical plant with iconic split leaves. Perfect for bright indirect light. Low maintenance and air-purifying.

name: Snake Plant
info: Hardy and drought-tolerant plant that thrives in low light. Great for beginners and improves air quality.

name: Rose Plant
info: Beautiful flowering plant with fragrant blooms. Requires full sunlight and regular watering.

name: Bougainvillea
info: Vibrant flowering plant that thrives in full sun. Drought-tolerant once established. Multiple color options.

name: Peace Lily
info: Elegant white flowers with glossy leaves. Thrives in medium to low light. Excellent air purifier.

name: Pothos Golden
info: Easy-to-grow trailing plant with heart-shaped leaves. Adaptable to various light conditions.

name: Tomato Seeds - Hybrid
info: High-yield tomato seeds perfect for home gardens. Disease-resistant variety with large fruits.

name: Marigold Seeds Mix
info: Colorful annual flower seeds. Easy to grow and attract pollinators. Blooms all summer.

name: Organic Potting Mix - 5kg
info: Premium quality potting soil with peat moss, perlite, and compost. Ideal for all indoor plants.

name: NPK Fertilizer 19:19:19
info: Balanced all-purpose fertilizer for healthy plant growth. Water-soluble formula. 500g pack.

name: Garden Tool Set - 5 Pieces
info: Complete gardening toolkit with spade, fork, trowel, pruner, and cultivator. Durable steel construction.

name: Watering Can - 5L
info: Sturdy plastic watering can with long spout. Perfect for indoor and outdoor plants. Ergonomic design.
